name: part_003
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】白上フブキ生誕祭2024　#FBKINGDOMPROLOGUE【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ 】 [-a68MSMFuuM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Prologue story section with a storybook aesthetic depicting a fox character and her companion.
MC section where Fubuki greets the audience, introduces the 'FBKingdom Prologue' theme, and talks about the building of the kingdom's castle.
Performance of the song 'Majo to Senritsu no Machi' (The Witch and the City of Melody).

subtitles.original: これからの未来に思いを馳せるのでした。
subtitles.english: She was thinking about the future to come.

subtitles.original: 本日は、フブキングダム・プロローグにお越しくださりありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you all for coming to FBKingdom Prologue today!

subtitles.original: うわー！
subtitles.english: Whoo!

subtitles.original: 皆さん見てください、後ろ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, look behind me!

subtitles.original: なんかでっかいのが建ってる！
subtitles.english: There's something huge built back there!

subtitles.original: もしや、これはフブキングダムのお城が？
subtitles.english: Could this be the FBKingdom castle?

subtitles.original: ちょっとずつちょっとずつ出来上がってるってこと？
subtitles.english: Does this mean it's being built bit by bit?

subtitles.original: わーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ちょっと今までね、フブキングダム結構曖昧なところがあり、皆がダンボールに住んでたりなどなどしてきましたけども、
subtitles.english: Until now, FBKingdom has been a bit vague, with everyone living in cardboard boxes and such,

subtitles.original: ついに今日、もしがすると立派なお城が建つのかな？どうかな？
subtitles.english: but finally today, maybe a grand castle will be built? What do you think?

subtitles.original: ここから始まるフブキングダム、ちょっと皆さんお楽しみにしてください！
subtitles.english: Please look forward to the FBKingdom that starts from here!

subtitles.original: そして本日の生誕のハッシュタグなんですけども、皆さん、
subtitles.english: And as for today's birthday hashtag, everyone...

subtitles.original: フブキングダムプロローグとなっておりまーす！
subtitles.english: it's FBKingdom Prologue!

subtitles.original: カタカナとね、英語、どっちでもオッケーということで、海外ニキは英語かな？と思っております。
subtitles.english: Both Katakana and English are fine, so I think the overseas fans will probably use English.

subtitles.original: まず１曲、２曲とちょっと続けてね、紙芝居なんかも挟みつつ、楽しんでいただけましたでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Did you enjoy the first two songs and the picture story show that followed?

subtitles.original: ここからはね、ちょっとダンスとかめちゃめちゃ頑張るパートなので、今から気合を入れていこうと思いまーす！
subtitles.english: From here, it's a part where I'll be working really hard on dancing, so I'm going to psych myself up now!

subtitles.original: たくさんたくさんスクショとか、ポストとかしてくださいね。よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Please take lots and lots of screenshots and make posts. Thank you!

subtitles.original: では次の曲、行ってみましょう！
subtitles.english: Now, let's head to the next song!

subtitles.original:
魔女と旋律の街
作詞・作曲・Fly
subtitles.english:
The Witch and the City of Melody
Lyrics/Composition: Fly

subtitles.original: 宵の街 照らす灯火
subtitles.english: A lamp illuminating the evening town

subtitles.original: 高らかに 響く旋律
subtitles.english: A melody echoing loudly

subtitles.original: 月明かり 背に受けながら
subtitles.english: While bathing in the moonlight from behind

subtitles.original: 独り 魔女は歌う
subtitles.english: Alone, the witch sings

subtitles.original: 少女はためらう 目的地見出せずに
subtitles.english: The girl hesitates, unable to find her destination

subtitles.original: 杖を掲げた まだ見ぬ明日へ向かって
subtitles.english: She raised her staff, toward the unseen tomorrow

subtitles.original: 杖を掲げた まだ見ぬ明日へ向かって
subtitles.english: She raised her staff, toward the unseen tomorrow

subtitles.original: 鐘の音がこだましようとも
subtitles.english: Even if the sound of bells echoes

subtitles.original: この世界で 魔女にはなれない
subtitles.english: In this world, she cannot become a witch

subtitles.original: 空とたゆたう 旋律
subtitles.english: A melody swaying with the sky

subtitles.original: 空とたゆたう 旋律
subtitles.english: A melody swaying with the sky

subtitles.original: 誓いさえ 風に吹かれて
subtitles.english: Even her oath is blown by the wind

subtitles.original: 誓いさえ 風に吹かれて
subtitles.english: Even her oath is blown by the wind

subtitles.original: 広場に繋がる 路地裏
subtitles.english: An alleyway leading to the square

subtitles.original: そのゆえ 時計台上見上げて
subtitles.english: For that reason, looking up at the clock tower

subtitles.original: 石畳 独り佇む
subtitles.english: Standing alone on the cobblestones

subtitles.original: 石畳 独り佇む
subtitles.english: Standing alone on the cobblestones

subtitles.original: 影を落とす少女
subtitles.english: The girl casting a shadow

subtitles.original: 影を落とす少女
subtitles.english: The girl casting a shadow

subtitles.original: 自らの呪縛で
subtitles.english: By her own curse

subtitles.original: 自ら 苛み続ける
subtitles.english: She continues to torment herself

subtitles.original: 例え手を差し伸べようとも 解けはしないでしょう
subtitles.english: Even if you reach out a hand, it won't be undone

subtitles.original: 例え手を差し伸べようとも 解けはしないでしょう
subtitles.english: Even if you reach out a hand, it won't be undone

subtitles.original: かつてあるものの 凋落で
subtitles.english: With the decline of what once was

subtitles.original: 国は滅びて
subtitles.english: The nation perishes

subtitles.original: 国は滅びて
subtitles.english: The nation perishes

subtitles.original: 物語を紐解こうとも
subtitles.english: Even if I unraveled the story

subtitles.original: 私はまだ君に学べない
subtitles.english: I still haven't learned from you

subtitles.original: 望まれるように 演じる
subtitles.english: Playing the part as desired

subtitles.original: 望まれるように 演じる
subtitles.english: Playing the part as desired

subtitles.original: 役割は日々ゆらめいて
subtitles.english: The role fluctuates day by day

subtitles.english: The role fluctuates day by day

subtitles.english: In the morning sun illuminating thin ice
